docs.text: Augmented Graphs Evaluator ¶ A new awesome project. Installation ¶ pip install git+ssh://git@github.com/crisostomi/augmented-graphs-evaluator.git Quickstart ¶ Development installation ¶ Setup the development environment: git clone git+ssh://git@grok-ai/crisostomi/augmented-graphs-evaluator.git conda env create -f env.yaml conda activate age pre-commit install Run the tests: pre-commit run --all-files pytest -v Update the dependencies ¶ Re-install the project in edit mode: pip install -e . [ dev ]
